industry: Entertainment Providers and Technology, Information and Media
description:
Night is a next-gen representation platform that serves as a talent management company for some of the world's most influential artists, including Kai Cenat, Safiya Nygaard, Hasan Piker, and more. Our platform comprises of Night Labs, Ventures, and Studios, offering a unique blend of talent management, venture capital, content development, and startup incubation.

We are seeking a dynamic and experienced professional to join our team as a Talent Coordinator based in the Los Angeles Metropolitan Area. As a Talent Coordinator at Night, you will play a key role in managing sponsorship deals, brand outreach, creator support, and more.

**Responsibilities**: 

* Represent Night as the point of contact for external brand/agency partners.
* Execute on select client-facing duties, including business procurement, as well as fostering ongoing business relationships and negotiating service agreements.
* Create and maintain reports on agencies & brands that are active in the industry.
* Support clients in the coordinator’s respective vertical on a daily basis.
* Identify inbound opportunities across all Night clients.
* Generate market research identifying popular trends.
* Track and process multiple deals using internal systems.
* Assist other coordinators and managers in day-to-day operations.

**Qualifications:**

* 1+ years of talent management or influencer marketing experience, working with brands and agencies.
* Bachelor’s degree or equivalent industry experience.
* Deep knowledge of YouTube and new media platforms from a business and consumer perspective.
* Extreme discretion; ability to handle confidential information.
* Superb communication & teamwork skills, both oral and written.
* Eagerness to learn from one of the top digital talent managers in the industry.
* Work hour flexibility (not your typical 9-5).

If you are an individual with a passion for the creator economy as well as a desire to contribute to the success of top-tier artists in the digital landscape, we invite you to apply for the position of Talent Coordinator at Night.

Please include a cover letter or a video application. We look forward to speaking with you!

Night is an equal opportunity employer. We celebrate diversity and are committed to creating an inclusive environment for all employees.
